TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WmpBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class WmpBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: 定義用來編碼 Microsoft Windows Media Photo 影像的編碼器。

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Microsoft Windows Media Photo images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 是新的轉碼器，提供更好的映像精確度，比使用較小的檔案大小的 JPEG 和更多功能。is a new codec that provides better image fidelity than JPEG with smaller file sizes and more features. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 映像會使用單一演算法，以達到失真和不失真壓縮。images achieve lossy and lossless compression by using a single algorithm. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 映像支援現有中繼資料的標準。images support existing metadata standards. 如需此格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Media Photo 規格](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/wmphoto.mspx)。For additional information about this format, see [Windows Media Photo Specification](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/wmphoto.mspx). [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 檔案不支援預覽、 全域的縮圖、 框架層級的縮圖或多個框架。files do not support preview, global thumbnails, frame level thumbnails, or multiple frames. 編碼無法在部分信任中運作。Encoding does not work in partial trust. 請參閱[WPF 部分信任安全性](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)的部分信任的詳細資訊。See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.

span.span: Windows Media Photo Specification

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何初始化編碼新的點陣圖影像。The following example demonstrates how to initialize a to encode a new bitmap image. [!code-cpp[wdpbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WdpBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/WDPEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[wdpbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WdpBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/WDPEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[wdpbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WdpBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/WDPEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Byte AlphaDataDiscardLevel { System::Byte get(); void set(System::Byte value); };
member this.AlphaDataDiscardLevel : byte with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定要在壓縮的領域轉換期間捨棄的 alpha 頻率資料的層級。

span.span: Gets or sets the level of alpha frequency data to discard during a compressed domain transcode.

value.span: 編碼影像時要捨棄的 alpha 資料等級。

span.span: The level of alpha data to discard when encoding the image.

value.span: 值的範圍是 0 （不捨棄資料） 為 4 （完全捨棄 alpha 色頻）。

span.span: The value range is 0 (no data discarded) to 4 (alpha channel completely discarded).
The default is 1.
Value

description.span: 描述

span.span: Description

description.span: 會不捨棄任何影像頻率資料。

span.span: No image frequency data is discarded.

description.span: 捨棄 flexbit。

span.span: FlexBits are discarded.

description.span: 影像的影像品質會降低而不需要變更影像的有效解析度。

span.span: The image quality of the image is reduced without changing the effective resolution of the image.

description.span: 捨棄 HighPass 頻率資料群組列會被捨棄。

span.span: HighPass frequency data band is discarded.

description.span: 減少映像的有效解析度在兩個維度的 4 倍。

span.span: The image's effective resolution is reduced by a factor of 4 in both dimensions.

description.span: 落在高通和低通濾波器頻率資料群組列都會被捨棄。

span.span: HighPass and LowPass frequency data bands are discarded.

description.span: 映像的有效解析度在兩個維度以 16 倍比例縮小。

span.span: The image's effective resolution is reduced by a factor of 16 in both dimensions.

description.span: 完全捨棄 alpha 色頻。

span.span: The alpha channel is completely discarded.

description.span: 像素格式已變更成反映 alpha 色頻的移除。

span.span: The pixel format is changed to reflect the removal of the alpha channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會具有效果才設為`true`和映像包含任一個平面或交錯 alpha 色板; 否則會忽略它。This property has an effect only if is set to `true` and the image contains either a planar or interleaved alpha channel; otherwise, it is ignored.

exception.span: 指定的值不是介於 0 到 4 之間。

span.span: The value given is not between 0 and 4.

member this.AlphaQualityLevel : byte with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定平面 alpha 色頻的壓縮品質。

span.span: Gets or sets the compression quality for a planar alpha channel.

value.span: 平面 alpha 色頻影像的壓縮品質。

span.span: The compression quality for a planar alpha channel image.

value.span: 值為 1 會被視為不失真，而增加這個值會導致較高的壓縮比率與較低的影像品質。

span.span: A value of 1 is considered lossless, and increasing values result in higher compression ratios and lower image quality.

value.span: 值範圍是 1 到 255 之間。

span.span: The value range is 1 to 255.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會具有效果才是`false`。This property has an effect only if is `false`.

summary.span: 取得或設定要在壓縮編碼期間水平分割的數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of horizontal divisions to use during compression encoding.

summary.span: 單一分割可以建立兩個水平區域。

span.span: A single division creates two horizontal regions.

value.span: 若要在壓縮編碼期間使用的水平分割數目。

span.span: The number of horizontal divisions to use during compression encoding.
The value range is 0 to 4095.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已`true`，必須設定為 0。If is `true`, must be set to 0. 相除所建立的圖格可以永遠不會是小於 16 像素為單位。A tile created by the division can never be smaller than 16 pixels. 值會調整為維護小的區塊大小。The value is adjusted to maintain the minimum tile size. 當搭配，方格的 tile 的正確。When used in combination with , a grid of tiles is formed. 例如，如果這兩個屬性會設定為 1，映像分成 4 個圖格。For example, if both properties are set to 1, the image is divided into 4 tiles.

if overlap is ignored; otherwise, .

summary.span: 取得或設定要在壓縮的領域轉換期間捨棄的影像資料的層級。

span.span: Gets or sets the level of image data to discard during a compressed domain transcode.

value.span: 要在映像的壓縮的領域轉換期間捨棄的影像資料等級。

span.span: The level of image data to discard during a compressed domain encoding of the image.

value.span: 值的範圍會是 0 （不捨棄資料） 至 3 （捨棄 HighPass 和 LowPass）。

span.span: The value range is 0 (no data discarded) to 3 (HighPass and LowPass discarded).
The default is 1.
Value

description.span: 描述

span.span: Description

description.span: 會不捨棄任何影像頻率資料。

span.span: No image frequency data is discarded.

description.span: 捨棄 flexbit。

span.span: FlexBits are discarded.

description.span: 影像的影像品質會降低而不需要變更影像的有效解析度。

span.span: The image quality of the image is reduced without changing the effective resolution of the image.

description.span: 捨棄 HighPass 頻率資料群組列會被捨棄。

span.span: HighPass frequency data band is discarded.

description.span: 減少映像的有效解析度在兩個維度的 4 倍。

span.span: The image's effective resolution is reduced by a factor of 4 in both dimensions.

description.span: 落在高通和低通濾波器頻率資料群組列都會被捨棄。

span.span: HighPass and LowPass frequency data bands are discarded.

description.span: 映像的有效解析度在兩個維度以 16 倍比例縮小。

span.span: The image's effective resolution is reduced by a factor of 16 in both dimensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會具有效果才設為`true`; 否則它會被忽略。This property has an effect only if is set to `true`; otherwise, it is ignored.

exception.span: 指定的值不在 0 和 3 之間。

span.span: The value given is not between 0 and 3.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定重疊處理等級。

span.span: Gets or sets the overlap processing level.
The overlap processing level.
The default is 1.
Value

description.span: 描述

span.span: Description

description.span: 啟用沒有重疊處理。

span.span: No overlap processing is enabled.

description.span: 已啟用一個等級的重疊處理。

span.span: One level of overlap processing is enabled.

description.span: 根據鄰近區塊的值來修改 4x4 區塊的編碼的值。

span.span: Encoded values of 4x4 blocks are modified based on the values of neighboring blocks.

description.span: 會啟用兩個等級的重疊處理。

span.span: Two levels of overlap processing are enabled.

description.span: 除了處理第一個層級 16x16 巨型區塊的編碼的值會根據鄰近巨型區塊的值來修改。

span.span: In addition to the first level of processing, encoded values of 16x16 macro blocks are modified based on the values of neighboring macro blocks.

Value

description.span: 描述

span.span: Description

description.span: 4:0:0 的編碼方式。

span.span: 4:0:0 encoding.

description.span: 捨棄色度內容;保留亮度。

description.span: 4:2:0 的編碼方式。

span.span: 4:2:0 encoding.

span.span: Chroma resolution is reduced by 1/4 of luminance resolution.

description.span: 4: 2:2 編碼方式。

span.span: 4:2:2 encoding.

description.span: 色度解析度減少為 1/2 的亮度解析度。

span.span: Chroma resolution is reduced to 1/2 of luminance resolution.

description.span: 4:4:4 的編碼方式。

span.span: 4:4:4 encoding.

description.span: 保留色度解析度。

span.span: Chroma resolution is preserved.

exception.span: 指定的值不在 0 和 3 之間。

span.span: The value given is not between 0 and 3.

The value range is 0 to 4095.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已`true`，必須設定為 0。If is `true`, must be set to 0. 相除所建立的圖格可以永遠不會是小於 16 像素為單位。A tile created by the division can never be smaller than 16 pixels. 值會調整為維護小的區塊大小。The value is adjusted to maintain the minimum tile size. 當搭配，方格的 tile 的正確。When used in combination with , a grid of tiles is formed. 例如，如果這兩個屬性會設定為 1，映像分成 4 個圖格。For example, if both properties are set to 1, the image is divided into 4 tiles.
